Item 8.01 - Other Events.content: On January 27, 2025, JPMorgan Chase & Co. issued a press release announcing the redemption on February 1, 2025 of all of the 3,000,000 outstanding depositary shares, each representing a one-tenth interest in a share of JPMorgan Chase & Co.’s Fixed-to-Floating Rate Non-Cumulative Preferred Stock, Series HH, par value $1.00 per share and with a liquidation preference of $10,000 (the “Series HH Preferred Stock”), pursuant to the optional redemption provisions in the documents governing such depositary shares and the Series HH Preferred Stock. A copy of the press release referenced above is attached hereto as Exhibit 99.1.

subsections.d_Exhibits:
99.1 JPMorgan Chase & Co. press release dated January 27, 2025.
101 Pursuant to Rule 406 of Regulation S-T, the cover page is formatted in Inline XBRL (Inline eXtensible Business Reporting Language).
104 Cover Page Interactive Data File (embedded within the Inline XBRL document and included in Exhibit 101).
